Hello! I am Sung Manhin.

I am from Qufu, Shandong. I am currently a master student at the [School of Statistics](http://stat.ruc.edu.cn), Renmin University of China, specializing in **Epidemiology and Biostatistics**. 

# My research interests focus on **hypothesis testing** and the application of biostatistical methods. I am continually exploring this field to contribute to the advancement of public health.

:::
